main event: A bright white object was seen moving slowly and erratically in Smyrna, Georgia on 3rd August 1952.
interesting points: The sighting was reported by a civilian woman and witnessed by two others.
The object was described as very bright and was seen for nearly 20 minutes.
The document was from Project Blue Book, which was a US Air Force study of UFO reports.
The weather conditions and altitudes at the time of the sighting were also recorded in the report.
The conclusions listed possibilities ranging from balloon to astronomical, with 'unknown' being the final assessment.
